reviewText: you might be able to only buy this used, but it's well worth it. if i had to pick one DVD with the highest number of hot babes on it this would be it. I've played this many times at late night house parties (with men and women and even the women liked it). The DVD unfortunately short but that's my only real complaint. the footage overall is so awesome, and you know people would do anything to attend one of these parties. you see not only most of the hottest bunnies over the last 20 years like pam anderson, carmen electra, victoria silvstedt but some famous actors, comedians, rock stars and such. definitely worth the money used. another good one is: Playboy - Mansion Parties, Hottest Moments & Body Painting but not as good as this one.

Some of the other reviewers are right that this DVD is just clips from parties at the Playboy Mansion, with no interviews and no host. But still it's lots of fun, and I like to run it in the background at my own parties to add a festive atmosphere. There's a moderate amount of outright nudity or at least flashing, though most of the party girls have on sexy outfits most of the time. My only criticism is that it should have been longer than just 50 minutes, maybe by adding about 30 minutes of hot Grotto footage, since that isn't seen much here. This is really best as a complement to the DVD "Inside the Playboy Mansion," since that DVD gives just brief glimpses of the parties, and it's also good to get the "Playboy Mansion Parties Wildest Moments & Body Painting" DVD too.
